item.title: Quick Introduction to R
item.description: WORK IN PROGRESS! There are many R tutorials out there. This one aims to be a jump start to get you to know exactly what you need to start using R while ignoring all the stuff that you can quickly search for. As for many topics, tools, and trades, getting the feel of things and figuring out the way they work is the first step. Everything else is the details, so to speak.
